pr_title: KAFKA-10628: remove all the unnecessary parameters from the tests which are using TopologyTestDriver

KAFKA-10628: remove all unnecessary parameters from tests using TopologyTestDriver

timeline.bodyText: Is this method safeUniqueTestName useless now? It seems to me it tries to produce different name for each test case. Is it possible to make those tests flaky?
timeline.author: chia7712

replies.bodyText: Nice catch! @chia7712 , it's unused and I've removed this line now. Thanks.
replies.author: showuon
